transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello? Haanji.
Customer: Hello, Gopal ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Ji sir, good afternoon main
Executive: bol rahi hu IndiaMART head office se.
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: Sir services ke regarding jo aapne apna concern open kiya tha, uske regarding meri baat hui thi. Aapke jo secondary number pe person hai, unhone aapko update kiya tha?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ji?
Customer: Haan boliye kya keh rahe hain?
Executive: Toh sir unse meri baat hui. Pura jo services ka jo aapko issue aa raha tha ki leads jo hain customer ki requirement nahi hai aur baaki cheezein, uske regarding unse meri saari baatein ho gayi thi.
Executive: Toh aap bataiye ki concern abhi close kar dena hai?
Customer: Abhi toh wohi batayega na woh dekhega toh batayega mujhe kya pata.
Executive: Unko, unhone, maine, maine unse pucha toh unhone bola ki aap batayenge. Aap jaisa bolenge waisa karna hoga. Aur agar unhone bola
Customer: Woh toh ek din mein kya batadein bataiye. Samasya toh bani rehti hai isko solve ho nahi rahi hai.
Executive: Sir samasya toh bani rehti hai ki baar baar complaint bhi karte hain, achha thodi lagta hai.
Executive: Bilkul, bilkul. Tabhi toh hum bhi aapko bol rahe hain na sir jo aapki complaint hai uske regarding humne bataya ki buyers ka koi range nahi hota na. Uske alawa bhi toh hum aapko cheezein dete hain ki aap inquiry, calls, un sab pe bhi deals convert karte hain. Sirf buyleads toh provide karte nahi kyunki humein bhi pata hai buyleads pe aapke alawa chaar log aur baat karte hain. Total paanch log ko ek buylead jaati hai. Ho sakta hai customer sirf rate
Customer: Haanji?
Customer: Main iske baare mein kal baat karunga abhi aaj time pass karunga.
Executive: Sir phir yeh iska, iska kya karna hai jo aapka yeh ticket open hai? Iska bataiye.
Customer: Iska toh yahi karna hai abhi humare ko yeh kam jo aa raha hai na humara jo problem aa raha hai. Inquiry bechte ja rahi hai isko roko kaise rokoge woh aap dekho.
Executive: Toh wohi toh aapki baat hai. Aapki inquiry galat aati hai toh uska humein buylead dusra shuru karaiye.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Ghar kharab, dekhiye, IndiaMART thodi hai best kyun karenge aap.
Executive: Sir baat yeh nahi hai. Hum aapko ek hafte mein hum 44 buyleads de rahe hain. Aap ek, do ya jo bhi bol rahe hain. 44 mein se 44 toh kharab hongi nahi.
Customer: 44 nahi ho rahi, 10-15 inquiry kharab ho jaati hain ek week mein.
Executive: Theek hai. Chaliye 44 mein se hum 10 hata, hum 10 chhodo main 30 pe maan leti hu. 30 toh kaam ki aa rahi hain. Theek hai 10 main 14 hata de rahi hu.
Executive: 30 toh kaam ki aa rahi hain?
Executive: Hai na?

Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Haanji toh sir un 30 ka toh aap bol rahe hain ki 14 aapko hum credit back karayein aap yeh bol rahe hain?
Customer: Haan jo humare ko dekho woh aana nahi chahiye yeh galat aa raha hai.
Executive: Sir yeh dekhiye par aisa toh nahi hai matlab lead revert karai jaaye yeh aisa toh nahi hota na. Matlab aapko bhi pata hai ki buyleads kabhi toh inka number zyada hota hai.
Customer: Aapko pata hai na aapki aisa agar problem aati thi toh pehle aisa hota tha.
Executive: Pehle ki cheezon mein aur aapki cheezon mein toh bahut si cheezein change hui hain na sir aapko bhi pata hai pehle ka market abke market mein bhi fark hai. Pehle ke online business abke online business, online, offline, product line, prices har ek cheez mein change hota hai na sir. Kuch bhi cheez ek har samay ek jaisi toh nahi chalti hai. Hai na?
Executive: Har cheez mein changes hote hain.
Customer: Dekho fayde ka aadmi koi bhi karya karta hai kuch achhe ke liye. Aapne achha bataya, achha kiya usme achha hona chahiye na. Sahi karo usko. Dikkat nahi aani chahiye. Buylead galat aane se kaam thodi chalega. Buylead achhi aani chahiye na.
Executive: Main ek kaam karti hu main apne senior ko bolti hu woh aapko call kar lenge kyunki is tarike se nahi hota na sir. Tabhi toh maine aapko saari cheezein batai. Ab achha theek hai aapko buylead ka yeh ho gaya. Paanch, ek buylead paanch log baat karte hain. Aap baat kar lenge kaam ki bhi ho gayi toh kya customer saare 44 ke 44 aapko deal dete honge ek hafte mein sir yeh bhi toh ek nahi expected hai na. Offline bhi aisa nahi hota.
Customer: Aapka kehne ka seedha matlab hai ki agar aisa ho raha hai toh hone dijiye.
Executive: Aapko buylead reverts chahiye aap yeh bol rahe hain bas?
Customer: Bas. Buylead reverts humein bilkul nahi chahiye. Humko perfect dijiye aap jo aap purify karke bhejte ho na purify hona chahiye. Yeh nahi hona chahiye ki nahi, nahi, nahi main toh dusra product dekh raha tha yeh toh unhone galat bhej diya. Sir yeh nahi hona chahiye yaar yeh galat hota hai.
Customer: Yeh iska matlab seedha ho raha hai ki aap kuch bhi nahi dekh rahe hain. Aapne uthaya IndiaMART ki site mein koi bhi banda aaya chal ke aur usne kuch bhi bas chhed chhad zara si kar di single lead bana di aapne. Jabki aapne humko bataya tha ki hum buyer se baat karte hain. Buyer ka pehle requirement check karte hain. Buyer kya bol raha hai usko samajhne ke baad hum uske according bhejte hain. Yahi bola tha?
Executive: Buyleads jo post hoti hai woh customer aa raha hai jab woh requirement dalta hai toh usko fill karne ka option aata hai ki mujhe itni quantity chahiye, mera yeh location hai, mera yeh order value hai. Yeh sab fill agar customer yeh fill karke aa raha hai aur fill usse koi requirement nahi hai toh IndiaMART usme kuch intervene nahi kar sakta. Buyer ke mind pe hum kaise samajh sakte hain. Usne inquiry karte time dal diya ki usko hai requirement aur woh baat karte mein mana kar raha hai toh aap bataiye isme hum bhi ya koi bhi kya kar lega. Aapke paas bhi koi customer aaya uska intention hai lene ka aapki shop ke aane ke baad woh bol raha hai ki nahi ab mujhe nahi chahiye ab main baad mein batata hu toh us pe koi bhi kya karega sir. Bas aap itna bataiye buyer palat jayega toh aap, hum koi bhi kya karega?
Executive: Ispe hum kya karenge aap bataiye. Humare inquiry toh aap kya.
Customer: Yeh toh sahi ho raha hai. Aapki taraf se koi clear karta nahi hai bas uthaya aur bhej dete hain. Haan aap us din aapko catalog mein bhi dikhaya tha. Offset printing ki jagah pe sheet fed ki jagah pe web offset dal rakha hai. Web offset ki jagah sheet fed dal rakha hai. Toh woh koi jaankaar banda hota hai aisi taisi bitha dete hain aisi koi uthao aur dalo.
Customer: Toh yeh fark padta hai in sab system hoga. Aur aap phir jo kya naam hai jo branch manager baitha hai woh kya dekh nahi raha usko pata nahi hai ki system kya hota hai sheet fed kya hota hai web offset kya hota hai.
Customer: Single color kya hota hai, four color kya hota hai saare catalog ki band baja rakhi pehle bhi humne kitni baar bataya. Aur humne saara system likh likh ke bheja hai dala hai jab catalog banwaya.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Jab aap plus ki baat karte ho jab toh aap sab kuch yes karte ho aur jab kaam ho jaata hai phir usko theek se dekh nahi pa rahe ho catalog yeh galat cheez ho rahi hai na. Isse fark nahi kitna kuch toh pad raha hoga. Aaj humare catalog mein koi site pe visit kar raha hoga woh agar jaankaar banda hoga woh dekhega yaar yeh toh kuch bhi dal rakha hai yeh company kya hai. Isko kya baat karein.
Executive: Haan. Aap rukiye main sir ko call deti hu wohi baat kar lenge aap.

Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Hello, sir namaste kaise hain aap?
Customer: Ji badhiya badhiya.
Executive: Ji ji ji. Ah kya dikkat aa rahi hai sir services mein matlab leads mature nahi ho rahi hain kya humari?
Customer: Dekhiye jab dikkat hoti hai na tabhi kuch bolte hain. Hamein jo sabse badi problem yeh hai.
Customer: Sir usme jo lead bhej rahe ho na woh clear bhejiye.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Clear lead aani chahiye bas kul mila ke humari baat yeh hai. Aisi lead nahi aani chahiye. Humare ko kya hai 10 lead dijiye aap sirf woh chalega lekin achhi honi chahiye.
Executive: Sir aap dekhiye
Customer: Aisi lead nahi honi chahiye jiska koi sense hi nahi matlab aapko aisi leads milti hain jo buyer interested nahi hote hain woh deal humari convert nahi hoti hai na?
Customer: Haan bilkul.
Executive: Abhi main, main uska reason thoda sa aapko batane ki koshish karta hu sir.
Customer: Aapne yeh bataya tha aap usko bhi humne dekha. Aapne kaha tha timing se chaliye.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Aapne kaha tha
Executive: Nahi sir meri actually first time aapse baat ho rahi hai. Maine bhi kuch cheezein aapki profile bhi notice ki jab Priya aapse baat kar rahi thi. Toh maine yeh dekha sir ki aap ek buyer ki journey samjho jaise aapne printing machine ki requirement aapko hai theek hai. Aap Mathura ke rehne wale hain. Aapne Mathura se inquiry dali hai. Buyer aap samjho ki agar South ka hai koi supplier South ka hai unhone aapki buylead ko consume kar liya. Ab South se agar aapke paas call aayega as a buyer aap kya bologe sir? Teen chaar scenario hote hain. Ek toh aapko pata hai sir agar mujhe aas paas ka supplier aap maybe dhund rahe ho matlab yeh scenario hote hain aksar ki agar aap aas paas se supplier ko search kar rahe ho toh waha pe aap sir yeh bol doge ki nahi nahi humne nahi dala tha galti se dal diya tha. Ya toh aap
Customer: Suno South, South wale ko toh hum uthate hi nahi hain pehle toh.
Executive: Sir main, haanji bataiye.
Customer: Hum uthate hain apna, apna hi buyer local buyer.
Executive: Theek hai. Baat hoti kya hai sir jaise ki main kal, main uthata nahi hu. Lead kal maine uthaya Faridabad ka lead tha.
Customer: Yeh Lucknow ki jo lead aaj aapne uthai thi printing machine ki aaj usme kya baat hui hai sir Sanjeet ji ki?
Customer: Aaj maine nahi uthai ladke ne uthai hai woh.
Executive: Toh achha ladke ne uthai hai.
Customer: Hari, Hari karke tha koi Faridabad ka. Bola sir meri usme likha hua web offset printing machine.
Executive: Faridabad ke lead. Ek second main open kar leta hu sir Faridabad ki. Ah Faridabad aaj aayi thi sir aapke paas?
Customer: Kal, kal, kal ki baat hai.
Executive: Kal aayi thi na? Ek minute sir main lead open kar leta hu phir main aapko na exact baat kar paunga aapse. Ah Faridabad Bareilly ki aapne kya achha haan yeh offset printing machine ki web offset.
Executive: Hari ji ki aapne Faridabad se consume ki thi.

Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Hari ji ki lead ki baat kar rahe ho na jo aapne Faridabad se consume kiya tha?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ab inme kya issue aaya sir?
Customer: Woh bol raha hai ki nahi sir maine toh aisa kuch likha hi nahi hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Mera toh jo usne contact apna jo bataya na base woh kuch alag hi base bata raha tha. Printing se relation toh uska koi tha hi nahi door door tak. Maine kaha aapne phir kya bole maine toh IndiaMART walon ko dusra message aa raha tha. Aur aur jisme maine check kiya tha woh, woh unhone bheje nahi the web offset kaise laga diya.
Executive: Theek hai sir main ek kaam karta hu yeh leads na ek baar humari jo buylead
Customer: Uske baad do, do lead phir usne humne uthai usme bhi aisa hi aaya. Matlab teen chaar lead aisi chali gayi subah subah baat karne baithe aur woh sab matlab ajeeb si baat hai toh bada atpata lagta hai yaar yeh kya lead aa rahi hai. Mera jo baat hai woh mera kehna ek hi cheez ka hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. Ki jo lead mere ko bheji ki woh hum verify karke bhejte toh verify kis baat ki hui hai verify toh hui nahi woh.
Executive: Sir aapko verify karna padega. Haanji haanji.
Customer: Verify ho jaati toh woh aati nahi humare paas.
Executive: Sir verify toh lead hoke aati hain but humein thoda sa yeh cheezein samajhni padengi jo aap Faridabad ki baat keh rahe ho na yeh lead 11 tareekh ko aayi thi humare paas mein. Yani 11 tareekh ko ek din pehle buyer ne apni inquiry IndiaMART ko dal di thi. But aap dekhoge toh yeh lead aapne agle din consume ki hai. Aap inka number mujhe bata
Customer: Haanji. Agle din ki usse fark nahi padta usse toh yeh fark padega.
Executive: Bilkul, bilkul fark padta hai sir main bata raha hu.
Customer: Nahi nahi koi fark nahi padega. So woh banda hai hi nahi is vishay ka. Woh banda waha machine ke baare mein baat hi nahi kar raha hai.
Executive: Aap mujhe ek baar unka number bataoge sir?
Customer: Woh maine de rakha hai maine woh waha se woh hata diya tha toh maine diya tha.
Executive: Hari ji ka web offset ke naam se?
Customer: Eh?
Executive: Aapne Ria ji ko number share kiya hai unka?
Customer: Haan kiya nahi woh usme hum jo online dekh rahe the maine unko bataya tha usme hai bande ka number. Theek hai toh aap, aap ek kaam karo sir main ah jo leads aati hain na jo non-relevant lead hoti hain jo buyer kehta hai ki humne requirement nahi dali thi unka ek screenshot leke buyer ka Ria ji jo aapke account manager hai na unke paas aap forward kar do. Humari buylead ki team hoti hai jo leads ko approve karti hai verify karti hai.
Customer: Ria ji ko main saari detail nikalwa ke bhejwa dunga.
Executive: Haan aap ek ek lead bhej do toh hum kya karenge sir hum buylead team ke paas query karenge aur aapko uska resolution bhi provide karenge ki actual mein us lead mein kya hua tha kaise verify hoke humare paas aayi hai. Toh ek ek lead ka hum discussion kar lenge jo bhi aap consume karte ho but meri taraf se ek suggestion hai sir jo bhi leads aapke paas aati hain na woh aap try karo ki woh fresh consume karo jaise hi buyer IndiaMART mein inquiry dalta hai.
Customer: Fresh consume karte hain na fresh lead hi nahi milti hai bolo kaha se karein. Sir fresh hum bol pe jaate hain. Ab night mein 12 baje jo lead aa rahi hai aap samajhiye. Haan haan. Toh office aadmi 9-10 baje hi aayega 10 baje dekhega na uska time kitna ho gaya over bataiye. Sir aap raat ki leads ko mat consume karo uski main baat nahi nahi kar raha hu but din mein jab aap baithte ho na toh waha pe ek
Customer: Sir leads aati hain but leads humari sold out ho jaati hain. Humse pehle paanch log jaise hi consume karte hain woh leads humein nahi milti hain. Uska aap ek kaam karoge sir mere saath video meeting pe discuss kar sakte ho main achhe tarike se
Customer: Abhi office abhi nikalne ki tayari mein hain hum khada hu main.
Executive: Main kal, kal aapko kitne baje call karu sir?
Customer: Aap 2 baje ke baad karna.
Executive: Chalo main aapki 3 baje ki meeting schedule kar deta hu. Aapse bhi kuch cheezein main check kar leta hu jo aapne leads consume ki thi kuch cheezein mujhe lagti hain ki humari taraf se correction hona chahiye woh main kal 3 baje aapke saath baith ke discuss kar leta hu sir.
Customer: Okay. Okay sir, okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving irrelevant buyleads.

- Doubts about the lead verification process.

- Catalog has incorrect information.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the buylead process.

- Executive offered to investigate specific leads.

- Executive scheduled a meeting to discuss issues.



Next Steps: 

- Meeting scheduled for the next day at 3 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, verification, leads quality
